protocol.description: This is a private Gamescope protocol. Regular Wayland clients must not use it.

enum.name: arm_flag
enum.description: Flags that control how the action is armed.

entry.name: one_shot
entry.summary: disarm this action immediately after trigger. unrelated to niko

entry.name: no_block
entry.summary: don't block the result of this shortcut being seen by the app and keep processing hotkeys

enum.name: trigger_flag
enum.description: Flags that say how the action was triggered.

entry.name: keyboard
entry.summary: action was triggered by keyboard trigger

arg.name: description
arg.summary: human-readable description as to what the action is for, used for debugging purposes.

arg.name: sequence
arg.summary: global sequence no of actions that have been trigged

arg.name: time_lo
arg.summary: lower bits of 64-bit timestamp in nanos (CLOCK_MONOTONIC)

arg.name: time_hi
arg.summary: upper bits of 64-bit timestamp in nanos (CLOCK_MONOTONIC)
